text:
ant dist failes with:

dist:
     [echo] Grabbing XML:DB API sources. You must type the anoncvs password
CVS password:       [cvs] (Logging in to anoncvs@cvs.dbxml.org)

      [cvs] cvs [login aborted]: connect to cvs.dbxml.org:2401 failed: Connection refused
    [mkdir] Created dir: /Users/dirkx/CoFi/src/xml-xindice-1.0/xmldb
      [cvs] cvs [checkout aborted]: connect to cvs.dbxml.org:2401 failed: Connection refused

Is this perhaps a stale link ?

Dw.
